document_data.name: Kharran Fel
document_data.Appearance: Kharran was 6'3" (1.9 m) tall with long brown hair and a beard.
document_data.Equipment: Kharran carried three [[hand axe]]s, using two of them at once in combat, but also carried a [[battle axe]] if he encountered stronger foes. He wore [[leather armor]] and wore a ''[[ring of protection]] +2''.
document_data.History: Kharran moved from one adventuring band to another in the [[Western Heartlands]] until he came across the injured werewolf [[Arahnar]], felt pity for her and fell in love with her.
